website_summaries.verdict: These all-in-one sock shin guards are great for younger children who probably won't experience much physical contact. Designed for ages 4 through 6.
pros: Guards are ultra-light and plastic molded
Sock is flexible and allows great range of motion
Removable EVA foam inserts for extra impact protection
Kids can put these on themselves in one motion
cons: Holes wear in the bottom easily

customer_reviews.title: Have yet to wash but so far I'm pleased for $10
customer_reviews.text: My son is 5 and wears a size 12.5 little kid shoe. These are just as expected. Have yet to wash but so far I'm pleased for $10. Will be buying my 4 year old the same pair for ease and comfort of less equipment to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easier
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son gets frustrated with his shin guards - he complains that they're a pain to put on, they're uncomfortable, and there hard to clean when they get stinky! These socks solve the problem. While he does not wear these on game days, they are great for every day practice. They're more comfortable for him to put on, easy to put on, and easy to wash. You just slip out the shin guard and wash the socks as normal! Once dry, slip the guards back in. They are true to size and really solved a problem that we had. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie L

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: We bought these because the league my kids play in require this type of shin guard and these were the only ones we could find in the correct size. We bought 2 pair (1 for each kid). The sizing is way off though and the socks are very tight on both boys. After only 1 wear the foam padding is falling apart and there are holes in the toes of all of the socks. Not worth the money at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Smith

customer_reviews.title: These socks say “champion sports” in white writing across the front
customer_reviews.text: The sock with the shin guard inside is just what I was looking for for my 3 year old son. They fit well and seem to be good quality. However, they say “champion sports” in white writing across the front, which wasn’t shown in the product photos. Rated this 3 stars because I was looking for plain socks.
customer_reviews.author: Tanna Curry

customer_reviews.title: So happy we found these!
customer_reviews.text: We love these socks! Our 8-year old son (with size 5 boys/youth foot) loves these because they're so easy to put on and take off. He plays goalie for every game and they protect him well. We bought 2 pairs of the large (8-10 size) and have washed them multiple times, they've been holding up really well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sisbarro

customer_reviews.title: They slide on easy (as easy as soccer socks can
customer_reviews.text: Fit well. This is the 2nd pair of these I have bought. The fit weel. They slide on easy (as easy as soccer socks can...ugh). The shin guards are made to slide Inode a pocket inside the sock. This prevents the guards from slipping or having to be strapped on. If you struggle to get the shin guard in...try putting it in the sock before putting the sock on the child. The socks wash in the washer with no shrinking. Each time i remove the shin guards i spray thwm quick with lysol and let the dry. No foot odor....no bending cracking or breaking. These will last me a couple more years before all my kids grow out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Toni McKean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son played soccer this summer. I bought these figuring he wouldn't mess with these if they're built into socks as opposed to the shin guards you strap on. He loved them! Once they were on he never had to adjust them. They were a little big, as I expected, so they went past the bottoms of his shorts, but they didn't get in the way or anything. They didn't slide around like other shin guards do and they held up through the wash throughout the season
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Stover

customer_reviews.title: Way too thin
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I love this style with the pocket in the sock & the shin guard included. My son has very skinny legs and these are the only shin guards that stay in place. That part of the sock I love. HOWEVER, after ONE use, one of the socks has holes in the bottom. I haven't even washed them. Way too thin. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: MAJ

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: The socks look good and my 7y.o. loves them. Having sheen guards built-in solved the problem of guards coming loose in the past. I washed the socks a couple of times without removing the guards - no problem yet.
customer_reviews.author: IgorK

customer_reviews.title: Thicker n shin guard sleeve pocket is closed for top n bottom
customer_reviews.text: My son has not use this in the game but just trying it at home he said he like it. The pocket for the shin guard is thicker has closed sleeve does not slide up and down cuz the bottom and top of the sleeve is close. My son said champion brand is easier to put on We bought a diff brand but the shin guard pocket is way thinner top n bottom of the sleeve is open which can cause the guard to slide up.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. My kiddo is 4' tall and 46 lbs (lean kid) and has a size 2.5 foot. We ordered the medium and they fit him perfectly with a little room to grow. Very pleased with these soccer socks and shin guards. My kiddo hates the shin guards being directly on his skin, so this is the perfect solution. As far as durability, we will have to wait for a consensus on that. He has only worn them once. Wish I had bought these many soccer seasons ago!
customer_reviews.author: Prime member

customer_reviews.title: Great for Tot Soccer
customer_reviews.text: I like that this set is easy to put together, wash and easy for my 3 year old to get on. The price was good especially since tot soccer is played for such a short period of time. It protects the kids shins well for this age level. Once kids get into more aggressive leagues they will likely want something beefier but this is perfect for the littles.
customer_reviews.author: AFB

customer_reviews.title: Great shin guards
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are socks with a pocket for the shin guards to stay put. You can easily slide them in and out to wash the socks. They’re nicely made, socks feel good on my five year old, and they look good, too. Would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: NIB

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, great value!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 8, almost 9 year old for a short Season of fall soccer. The shin guard slides into the sock which is soft and stretchy. Machine washable (take out the shin guard to wash). We bought the Large 8-10 which you can see in the pic how they fit and 8-9 year old.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAholic

customer_reviews.title: Nice soccer socks with integrated pocket for shin guards
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice soccer sock that has a pocket for inserting the shin guards so the shin guards remain in place during play. The socks came with the shin guards and is of good quality for the price. However, the sock is missing an important feature - side ankle protection found in some other soccer socks and hence the removal of one star. Otherwise, we have been happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great all in one product for the young soccer players!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love these! I ordered these for my six year old son who is on the bigger size, shoe size youth 3 and about the size of the average 8-9 year old. He is in his first season of soccer so doesn't need a whole lot in regards to protection. I have only washed them one time so far but they held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Gtwnfive

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price, durable, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shin guards for youth soccer, easy to take the shield part out for washing and then easy to put back in. They still looked amazing at the end of the season and he’ll be able to wear them for seasons to come. Totally recommend. Absolutely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: MDSarkett

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for a first Soccer Shinguards !!!
customer_reviews.text: Great choice for a first Soccer Shinguards !!! My daughter is 4 years old (but very tall for her age) and wears a size 11 and they fit perfectly. Machine washable for easy care. I didn't find hard to put the plastic shin guard back in place. Great price. I wish they have different colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: AMR

customer_reviews.title: Same size
customer_reviews.text: Don’t be deceived, the small and medium are the exact same size. Both are labeled small/medium on the package. Luckily it work out for me. They were a little to big, but worked; fit my 3 1/2 year old. Will work for a few more seasons for him. As for my 6 year old, they were a bit snug and might be to small next season.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 4 yr old
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my 4 year old. She's a bit on the taller side and these are great. They are easier for her to use than the bulkier pads that go under the socks. Wish there were cuter colors for the kids though.
customer_reviews.author: T M.

customer_reviews.title: Work well!
customer_reviews.text: These shin pads worked great for my four Year old. She had regular shin pads with socks over them that were making her extremely itchy. We tried these instead And they were soft and comfortable. We got size small and they fit pretty well (some extra space in the toe/foot area) well with room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole W.

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit for my son
customer_reviews.text: my son is 6-yr old now. I purchased medium size and fits perfectly. it's not very easy to wear by himself putting the shinguard to correct place, a little bit help from adult makes the wearing process lots easier. my son also said it is very comfortable to wear this.
customer_reviews.author: TimothyC

customer_reviews.title: Pocket sewn on wrong side of sock
customer_reviews.text: These would be great - we tried one on and it was fine so thought they will be perfect for practice. Tried to put them on for practice and my son couldn't get them on. When I helped him I realized it was because on the second sock the pocket was sewn on the calf side vs the shin side. We had already discarded the box/packaging etc so can't send them back.
customer_reviews.author: meiha123

customer_reviews.title: Great for Short Term Needs
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit flimsy but work well for what we are using them for...a 5 week once a week field hockey clinic. We didn't want to spend money on real shin guards and socks when the kids in the Pee Wee group aren't doing any hardcore stuff. After one washing there are some threads starting to show, but we will likely toss them once the series is done. The two girls we have using these are very petite (around 40-42 inches tall) and they come up to their knees but can be rolled down. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: BeachMom

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy shin guards!
customer_reviews.text: My son found these to be very comfy! He's 7 and very tall for his age and these fit perfectly. My only complaint is that after washing them it's been challenging to get the shin guard back into the sock. Otherwise, great!
customer_reviews.author: SmileyMom72

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Rec Soccer
customer_reviews.text: While our daughter's desire to play soccer did not last long, these shin guards were perfect. We did not have to worry about them riding up beyond her shins. They are a bit tough to put back in after washing, but very doable. If we do return to soccer I am sure we will use these again, but we may have to buy a larger size. I would definitely recommend these to any parent for recreational soccer.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: No ankle guard, which I would have disregarded, but the shin guard lining is all bent and misformed and not comfortable. Had better hopes for the brand. It may be an issue with storage or packaging
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 3 year old!
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my 3 year old. It’s his first time playing soccer so I wanted something affordable, but also comfortable and easy for my toddler. The quality is very good and it fits him perfectly and he’s even a little on the short side. They look cute too! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Goforth

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable socks
customer_reviews.text: These socks are great. Easy to get on and off. They look good for the price. The shin guards that they came with are just ok. We didn’t use them since my son has a better quality of shin guards. They did have the word champions on the front middle which I couldn’t see in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: CJM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great set of shin guards! Fit my 38 lb, 3.5 year old great. Didn’t ride up or down during his soccer practice.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Generally happy, but don't think they run large
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my 5 year old twin boys for indoor soccer. I like the price and that the shin guard is removable. I bought the age 4-6 size based on other reviewers saying they run large. I disagree, I think they are a little small and have also shrunk in the wash. My boys are thin and wear size 11 shoe, the foot fits perfectly right now with no extra room, and the legs seem a little too tight so that the boys are starting to complain about wearing them. It's now November, I originally bought these in October and I may buy a larger size for when soccer starts again in January.
customer_reviews.author: jbl

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: very good value..worked great...started breaking down after the season ended...so basically one year use but still great value
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Just What We Needed
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for our 4-year old. He wears a size 12 shoe and needed socks/shin guards for his first soccer season. These were exactly what he needed. The shin guard fits inside an interior pocket on the socks and can be easily removed for washing the socks.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: these were great for my 4 ft tall child
customer_reviews.text: these were great for my 4 ft tall child. They did start to fall apart within a week but we like the socks so we are going to keep them. need some better inserts
customer_reviews.author: dan o

customer_reviews.title: Easy. Comfortable. Durable.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size small for my four year old son and they work great! It was really easy to remove the shin guard from the internal pocket for washing. I would recommend these for younger players since the shin guard is all in one piece when putting it on and you don't have to worry about it coming loose or falling off during practice.
customer_reviews.author: rin

customer_reviews.title: They do the trick and wash nicely
customer_reviews.text: I love that these socks make it so that my son doesn't need another piece of equipment. They are easy to disassemble/reassemble for washing and my son says they are comfortable. I will definitely buy them, again, when he sizes up.
customer_reviews.author: Housewife

customer_reviews.title: Best idea for kids!
customer_reviews.text: These work so much better for kids than the ones with straps that wrap around legs. Both my girls hated the strap ones so we bought these as an alternative. They are very easy to put the pad in and out of and get the sock on the kids. I would have given it a 5 star but 1 of the pads is a bit torn at the top already, it still works so we will continue to use them and be more careful. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Winegirl

customer_reviews.title: Works for light use
customer_reviews.text: True to size with the 4-6 working for my 5 year old girl. They are pretty hard to get on and off and frayed to the point of disintegrating after one season.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Great fit but not super-durable insert
customer_reviews.text: Fit great. These are great to last 1 season tops. The socks hold up well but the inserts start falling apart. For price and convenience worth it though.
customer_reviews.author: Jen S

customer_reviews.title: These are the BEST shin guards for my 6 year old granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST shin guards for my 6 year old granddaughter! She was going to soccer camp, so I purchased 3 different sets of shin guards. These are the only ones she will wear. One set was the type that attaches to her leg and she places her own socks over them. The other was Adidas brand that I also purchased on here. The Adidas ones were too hard to put on and she didn't find them comfortable. I just wish the Champion Sports ones came in more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Kindergarten Granny

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect
customer_reviews.text: These fit my daughter great. She is almost 5 and just started soccer. The toe area is a little wide but with a little adjustment it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Easy soccer sock/shin guard solution for young kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 4-year-old son. He refused to wear the separate shin guards and soccer socks I bought previously but he loves these. He wears shoe size 12/13 and they fit him well with some room for growth. They are not easy to put on but no tall socks are easy to put on a kid. The pads remove for washing and are relatively easy to put back in. After one washing they are a little pilled so I doubt they'll last forever but they should work perfectly for his soccer league.
customer_reviews.author: Darci S

customer_reviews.title: Fits wide boys size 4
customer_reviews.text: My son is 7 and wears a size 4 boys shoe. He also has wide feet. These fit him great in the 8-10 and are easy to get on. Love that the shin guard is built in.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative if you kid dislikes regular shin guards.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter dislikes the way that regular shin guards squeeze her ankle. These offered a workable alternative, which she really finds comfortable. Each pair survives about 1-2 soccer seasons, which is about how long her usual soccer socks last anyway. I'm giving these 4 stars just because fitting the guards into the sock pocket requires an adult, and is not something my daughter can do on her own.
customer_reviews.author: NZ

customer_reviews.title: Lasted through the 5 week season
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality, but they made it through soccer season. My son plays in a 5yo league with a 5 week schedule and they were coming apart by week 3. They did make it through the season though so if you just need a temporary pair like we did, these are a cheap enough to not hurt your feelings when they fall apart. If you have a child who will need the same size for multiple seasons or plays year-round, you probably need to invest in a better quality pair.
customer_reviews.author: MostOkayestMom

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but hard for kids to use themselves
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 6 and is petite and this fits well. My son has the same ones in white for an extra season (he's an average size 6 year old). They have lasted through 2 seasons of soccer, so washings 2X a week for 12 weeks. The shin guards stay in place well. The only thing I don't like about them is that it's very hard for the kids to put the shin guards in themselves, so it definitely requires parental help in getting ready.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Good kids soccer socks!
customer_reviews.text: These are a perfect size for kids (4 & 7)! Love the removable shin guards! Hits right above the knee on kids that are 40 & 44 inches. Quality can be a bit better as strings were quick to come out. By quick, I mean like the 2nd or 3rd time they were used and washed!
customer_reviews.author: Casa De Oro

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE, LOVE, LOVE these!!!! They're really soft and so easy to take on and off, if your a soccer parent you'll understand that. Just wish they had girl colors
customer_reviews.author: Dessa Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for and they are huge!
customer_reviews.text: The sizing on these is far too broad. They are WAY too big for my son, but since the shield is inside the only way to ameliorate the issue is to bunch and fold the sock until his toes hit the end. They were cheap though, which is what I wanted. So I got what I paid for!
customer_reviews.author: Lona

customer_reviews.title: Smart choice!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful idea, and good fit. I needed to put a little extra thought into putting them on the little guy. I removed pad and washed in cold water, dried just a bit, think they might shrink...happy about purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 4-year old great! And so much simpler than trying to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 4-year old great! And so much simpler than trying to get a little kid to put on a shin guard + sock!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! Perfect for kids soccer! Fits my 5 year old well! The shin guards come out easily so you can wash the socks. Kinda hard to get on and off but that’s to be expected with tight, high socks. Works great and nice to have the socks and shin guards combined together!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Great for the soccer kid in your life
customer_reviews.text: These socks worked very well for my ten year old son. Easy to get on and off. Fit perfectly, look stylish, and protect his shins.
customer_reviews.author: Aryn Amber

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Love that I can take out the shin guards and wash the socks separately. The shin guards themselves dried fast on the edge of the bathtub after I quickly just handwashed them with mild soap and water. The socks are holding up great from the washer and dryer. Just the right amount of protection for little shins.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of one

customer_reviews.title: Functional but not great quality
customer_reviews.text: These were much more comfortable for my 4 year old than the shin guards they gave him for joining the league. However, one of the socks came with a hole in them. The sock can easily be patched up but still disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Prodigy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shin guard socks!  Totally love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son as the shin guards he borrowed from a friend were too small. I had them shipped via the one-day prime shipping. They got here on time for soccer the next day! AND THE SHIN GUARDS ARE REMOVABLE!!! I didn't read that, how cool! My son loved them, they fit him great, and I love that I can wash the socks without wrecking the guards! I would absolutely recommend these to any soccer kid!
customer_reviews.author: A. Alloy-McFarlin

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: These fit well and where easy to wash and put back together. Very comfortable for soccer
customer_reviews.author: cindy porter

customer_reviews.title: They were slightly annoying to get on and off and get pads I
customer_reviews.text: These did the trick for my beginner soccer player and I suppose for the price. They were slightly annoying to get on and off and get pads I. Any out for washing.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Fietek

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these, they’re very comfortable. He’s even taken the shinguard out and used it in other socks and it was still comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Trash Panda

customer_reviews.title: So much easier
customer_reviews.text: 7 year old boy...makes getting ready one step easier and we dont have the option of losing the seperate shin guards. They remove easily to wash the socks and they stay up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan R Gehr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for 4 foot 6 yo
customer_reviews.text: These are a Perfect fit for my 6YO. Not loose and not too tight. The socks were a little on the long side, but the shin guards fit perfectly. The plastic wasn't as hard as I was expecting but should do well enough for practices.
customer_reviews.author: Willie Graham

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fit well
customer_reviews.text: Fit well. Comfortable. My daughter is very picky and these are her favorite shingaurds. The sock material is very thin though, which works well for us but may not work for some who are looking for thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made, true to size
customer_reviews.text: Well made, true to size, good quality. Shin guards removable so you can wash the socks. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Sock quality is great. Guard is a difficult for my 6 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Sock quality is great. Guard is a difficult for my 6 year old to get in and out but after lots of practice he is getting better. If he sticks with soccer I think we'll switch to the stand-alone shin guards instead of the built in. This is not based on this item but just the overall built-in versus standalone.
customer_reviews.author: ProudMOMnNC

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. My five year old likes them and enjoys wearing them during games. They have jet his shins safe from kicks and injury.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Randle

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Convenient Soccer Socks With Shin Guards
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these for both of my children. They are comfortable, convenient, and look great. They have held up over 3 soccer seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Tracking Packages

customer_reviews.title: Great for 5yr old
customer_reviews.text: A little long in the feet but we can use them 2 seasons. Great pocket for shin guards. Purchased 2 pair & very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: LORI

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love! My son loves these socks for soccer. These have lasted a long time, after lots of wear and tear and many washings. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: These tore at the seams I will not be buying ...
customer_reviews.text: These tore at the seams I will not be buying these again they didn’t even last a full season! By no means was I compensated, rewarded or anything for my review this is honesty straight from me!
customer_reviews.author: Cassi M.

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son (4 years old), will wear these shin guards. They have a pocket for the guard to slip into, so nothing but the sock is touching his skin. These are also less expensive then others.
customer_reviews.author: Jen D.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Made it though the whole season. Still in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: StoneyA

customer_reviews.title: If your child plays soccer, get them these!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who plays soccer and could not be happier with them!! They are very comfortable while providing great protection for his legs with the shin guards, which are very easy to remove when it's time to throw them in the washer. The actual footbed is pretty wide, so there seems to be a lot of extra sock that has to go in the shoe, but my son has not complained so I guess it isn't an issue. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: lpr2

customer_reviews.title: solid
customer_reviews.text: these work as they are supposed to, keep shin guards in place. holding up over a year of once weekly play for a 4-5yr old. happy with these, will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: pdid

customer_reviews.title: Not Champion brand
customer_reviews.text: They seem fine, and the large size fits a 4Y foot. Note that these are NOT Champion brand (champion.com), but a cheap-o Chinese brand (championsports.com)
customer_reviews.author: igz

customer_reviews.title: Decent enough
customer_reviews.text: I had to order a size up so they would fit over my son's chunky legs, but I don't think that problem is specific to this brand of shin guards. I like the way the shin guards pull out for washing. They did start to string around the top elastic after the first wash.
customer_reviews.author: Jes.

customer_reviews.title: awesome for kids!
customer_reviews.text: we loved these socks - they were really easy to wash and they saved a TON of time when we had soccer games. with all the gear, it would sometimes get tedious to put the shin guards on, but these were so easy - just put on the sock and slip the guards in. also, i found the price to be very competitive with outside companies. esp with prime, price was really good.
customer_reviews.author: Steel Curtain

customer_reviews.title: Pay what you get
customer_reviews.text: Cheap stuff, guard foam get ripped easily. Fabric is stiff. Kid refuse to wear.
customer_reviews.author: crystalhours

customer_reviews.title: This pair is a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: Quality pair and very versatile. The sockes were sometimes worn with the standard shin guards or the ones you can slide inside the pockect of the sock. The elastic around the knee is very secure. Very easy to wash and fast drying when hung for a few hours. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Fit our 3 1/2 year old who wears size 10 sneakers. Held up in the wash. He his legs are thin. These probably would not fit a larger child.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Functional shin guards.
customer_reviews.text: They are likely for size 4-5T kids ideally, but our 2T kid wore them as well. We have skinny kids. The younger one has super thin legs. They worked fine for both. Handy to have socks and guards all in one. Easy to wash, easy to take out guard and put back in.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Heard

customer_reviews.title: Terrific shin guards for kids
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! My 4 year old has been wearing these for soccer, and they work wonderfully. Definitely worth the buy!!
customer_reviews.author: N & J

customer_reviews.title: Great for soccer tots!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful shin guard socks. I love how soft and relatively thin the sock material is, without feeling flimsy. The shin guard insert itself is just a bit small for my big 5-year-old width-wise, but is made of a flexible material that molds a bit to his leg, so it doesn't bother him at all. I'd love if it was wider, though, for more shin coverage and protection.
customer_reviews.author: Lisafie

customer_reviews.title: When I opened the bag I thought I had the ...
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the bag I thought I had the wrong size. I did not realise how much stretch these socks had in them. They fit perfectly and he loves them. And most importantly, the stretch did not compromise the thickness or comfort of the socks.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: Too small & hard to get on. 8 year old would t wear them. Waited too long to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Jobe74

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a hole!
customer_reviews.text: Pulled out the item and there was a HOLE in them. Deeply disappointed as I need them for a game on Saturday. When I tried to call the support line given, they kept transferring me and no one would help. I’d look for other options.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: They are great for young kids but one of the socks was ...
customer_reviews.text: They are great for young kids but one of the socks was not seen right so the padding was on the wrong side and my son could not get it on. I now how to sew so I fixed it as I did not have time to return it and wait for replacement. Otherwise they are sturdy in material and after being fixed the are great.
customer_reviews.author: sarah  winterstrom

customer_reviews.title: Love for my four year old thin, tall girl.
customer_reviews.text: Will never again buy the shin guards with straps! These stay up and are a great fit!
customer_reviews.author: Beth S.

customer_reviews.title: After only a couple wears, there were holes on ...
customer_reviews.text: After only a couple wears, there were holes on bottom and the foam delaminates from shinguard. Wondering if I just got a defective pair. Finally got chance to review
customer_reviews.author: Cy Shimizu

customer_reviews.title: didn't last a week
customer_reviews.text: Though comfortable, these socks did not even make it through a single week of soccer camp before they started shredding along the anterior ankle crease. They are not terribly breathable and not durable at all. They probably have another couple weeks of wear before they completely fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: where's naldo

customer_reviews.title: awsome!!!
customer_reviews.text: they worked great but soccer was not my sons cup of tea..
customer_reviews.author: paul k.

customer_reviews.title: I like the convenience of having an all-in-one sock/shin guard
customer_reviews.text: The shin guard length works well for my taller than average 4 year old son. I like the convenience of having an all-in-one sock/shin guard. However, I would not buy this again solely because the footed part has pilled so badly. It pilled after just one way. Too bad because otherwise, this was a good option
customer_reviews.author: S. Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use by 5year old. No need to put shin guard separately from socks and Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: wendycas

customer_reviews.title: Love this design for soccer shin guards.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shin guards that are encased in socks - so easy for kids to use and keep in place! The ages 6-8 size fit my 6-year-old son and 8-year-old daughter perfectly, and they washed up great (I removed the actual shin guards for washing, then put them back in. They have held up well to multiple washings, so far.
customer_reviews.author: mamasmiles

customer_reviews.title: Love the Concept But Beware
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept; however, the padding around the shinguard inserts have come apart after only wearing them for a week. I like the socks with the shinguard pockets but I'm going to have to buy new shinguard inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Fab5

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These wash and wear very well, stand up for years
customer_reviews.author: Marie Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Nice youth soccer socks!
customer_reviews.text: These youth soccer socks fit my 6 year old niece perfectly!The integrated, removable shin guards are a nice feature and very light. She has worn the socks for numerous game and practices without complaint or injury - Even after getting accidentally kicked in the shin by other players. Her mom says they fabric appears to holding up after a lot of wash cycles.
customer_reviews.author: Ludlow Lad

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: My son is a size 11 shoe in toddler and these fit great, he can probably wear these a year or so longe too
customer_reviews.author: Rita E.

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 6 yr old soccer player
customer_reviews.text: These are great socks/shin guards. Much more comfortable than the ones that go over the socks.
customer_reviews.author: Eye Opener

customer_reviews.title: These work perfectly for my 7-year-old soccer player. He ...
customer_reviews.text: These work perfectly for my 7-year-old soccer player. He has no problems with them. The padding is removable for washing.
customer_reviews.author: MyOpinion

customer_reviews.title: the color is great- overall great
customer_reviews.text: cheaper than other brands and much easier to use- the elastic band is more compliant. the color is great- overall great product
customer_reviews.author: monica
